entities.name: rodny pontner
entities.description: Roddy Pontner is mentioned as someone who is betting on Bulgaria to score first. He offered nice odds considering Ireland's front three are the strongest he has seen in years.

entities.name: agatha timms
entities.description: Agatha Timms is mentioned as someone who put up half shares in her eel farm on a week-long match.

entities.name: ludo bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is the one taking bets and seems to be disappointed when Mr. Weasley doesn't bet more.

entities.name: molly weasley
entities.description: Molly Weasley is mentioned as someone who wouldn't like her children betting.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley and his brother George are the ones placing a bet on Ireland to win.

entities.name: george weasley
entities.description: George Weasley is mentioned as someone who is betting with his brother Fred.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is the one getting the Snitch if Ireland wins.

entities.name: ireland national team
entities.description: Ireland's front three are mentioned as being the strongest Mr. Bagman has seen in years.

entities.name: bulgaria national team
entities.description: Bulgaria is mentioned as a team that Roddy Pontner thinks will score first.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is the object being bet on.

relationships.description: If Ireland wins, Viktor Krum will get the Snitch.
